body_html: We now have some of basics in place (i.e. ClusterSpec propagation, and ClusterResolvers) to allow this sort of thing, however we do not have anyone working on this now as far as I know. The latest tentative designs are pretty much identical to what @byronyi described in his comment above.

body: We now have some of basics in place (i.e. ClusterSpec propagation, and ClusterResolvers) to allow this sort of thing, however we do not have anyone working on this now as far as I know. The latest tentative designs are pretty much identical to what @byronyi described in his comment above.
